item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Robert Marley
item.description: "One love, one heart, one destiny." -- Robert Marley

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Geoffrey M. Gluckman
item.description: "Feel your emotions, Live true your passions, Keep still your mind." -- Geoffrey M. Gluckman

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Deng Ming-Dao
item.description: "All teachings are mere references. The true experience is living your own life. Then, even the holiest of words are only words." -- Deng Ming-Dao

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "The meaning of life is that it stops." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Geoffrey add a quote by Geoffrey M. Gluckman
Geoffrey add a quote by Geoffrey M. Gluckman
item.description: "One race, Many cultures, One place." -- Geoffrey M. Gluckman
